item.description:
Please join us for some laughs. The cost of the show is $15.00 (I have to charge $15.76 because there is a 76 cent processing fee for using Amazon Payments).

I'm going to have to buy the tickets upfront in order to reserve a table, therefore you can only respond yes to this event once your have purchased the tickets. If you would prefer, you can give me the payment of $15.00 (amount less the fees) the next time you see me and I will change your status on the system to reflect that you are also going to this event.

I hope to see you all there .

Some of us will be meeting for dinner @ Firefly's prior to the show. Please see the Firefly's dinner meetup to join us for dinner.

Ivone
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask the hostess for the Ivone or TFS table.
item.name: Comedy Show at Dante's in Firefly's
